hints.content:
When **dividing** by $10$, we shift our numbers $1$ place value to the right.

Number | Ten Thousands | Thousands | Hundreds | Tens | Ones
:-: | :-: | :-: | :-: | :-: | :-:| :-:
$56{,}900$ |$\searrow\redD5$ |$\searrow\goldD{6}$ | $\searrow\purpleD{9}$ | $\searrow\blueD{0}$ | $\searrow\greenD{0}$  
$56{,}900 \div 10$ |$?$ |$?$ |$?$| $?$| $?$

Number | Ten Thousands | Thousands | Hundreds | Tens | Ones
:-: | :-: | :-: | :-: | :-: | :-:| :-:
$56{,}900$ |$\searrow\redD5$ |$\searrow\goldD{6}$ | $\searrow\purpleD{9}$ | $\searrow\blueD{0}$ | $\searrow\greenD{\cancel0}$ 
$56{,}900 \div 10$ | |$\redD5$ |$\goldD{6}$| $\purpleD{9}$| $\blueD{0}$
